verses.verse: Moreover <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, Let me now choose <S%H977>out<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%>, and I will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%>:

And I will <S%H935>come<s%> upon him while he is <S%H3023>weary<s%> and <S%H7504>weak<s%> <S%H3027>handed<s%>, and will make him <S%H2729>afraid<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with him shall <S%H5127>flee<s%>; and I will <S%H5221>smite<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> only:

And I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto thee: the <S%H376>man<s%> whom thou <S%H1245>seekest<s%> is as if all <S%H7725>returned<s%>: so all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be in <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H5869>well<s%>, and all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>. pleased: Heb. was right in the eyes of, etc

And <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H53>Absalom<s%>, The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> that <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> hath <S%H3289>given<s%> is not <S%H2896>good<s%> at this <S%H6471>time<s%>. given: Heb. counselled

For, <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2365>Hushai<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H582>men<s%>, that they be mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, and they be <S%H4751>chafed<s%> in their <S%H5315>minds<s%>, as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H7909>robbed<s%> of her whelps in the <S%H7704>field<s%>: and thy <S%H1>father<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and will not <S%H3885>lodge<s%> with the <S%H5971>people<s%>. chafed: Heb. bitter of soul

Behold, he is <S%H2244>hid<s%> now in <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H6354>pit<s%>, or in <S%H259>some<s%> other <S%H4725>place<s%>: and it will come to pass, when some of them be <S%H5307>overthrown<s%> at the <S%H8462>first<s%>, that <S%H8085>whosoever<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> it will <S%H559>say<s%>, There is a <S%H4046>slaughter<s%> among the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>. overthrown: Heb. fallen

And he also that is <S%H1121>valiant<s%> <S%H2428><s%>, whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H738>lion<s%>, shall <S%H4549>utterly<s%> <S%H4549>melt<s%>: for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> that thy <S%H1>father<s%> is a mighty <S%H1368>man<s%>, and they which be with him are <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men<s%>.

Therefore I <S%H3289>counsel<s%> that all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H622>generally<s%> <S%H622>gathered<s%> unto thee, from <S%H1835>Dan<s%> even to <S%H884>Beersheba<s%>, as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude<s%>; and that thou <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H7128>battle<s%> in thine own <S%H6440>person<s%>. that thou: Heb. that thy face, or, presence go, etc

So shall we <S%H935>come<s%> upon him in <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall be <S%H4672>found<s%>, and we will <S%H5168>light<s%> upon him as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5307>falleth<s%> on the <S%H127>ground<s%>: and of him and of all the <S%H582>men<s%> that are with him there shall not be <S%H3498>left<s%> so much <S%H1571>as<s%> <S%H259>one<s%>.

Moreover, <S%H518>if<s%> he be <S%H622>gotten<s%> into a <S%H5892>city<s%>, then shall all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2256>ropes<s%> to that <S%H5892>city<s%>, and we will <S%H5498>draw<s%> it into the <S%H5158>river<s%>, until there be not <S%H1571>one<s%> small <S%H6872>stone<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> there.

And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%>. For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>appointed<s%> to <S%H6565>defeat<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%>, to the <S%H5668>intent<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> might <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> upon <S%H53>Absalom<s%>. appointed: Heb. commanded

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> unto <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, Thus and thus did <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and thus and thus have I <S%H3289>counselled<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%>, and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3885>Lodge<s%> not this <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> <S%H5679><s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, but <S%H5674>speedily<s%> pass <S%H5674>over<s%>; lest the <S%H4428>king<s%> be swallowed <S%H1104>up<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are with him.

Now <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> <S%H5975>stayed<s%> by <S%H5883>Enrogel<s%>; for they <S%H3201>might<s%> not be <S%H7200>seen<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city<s%>: and a <S%H8198>wench<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> them; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>.

Nevertheless a <S%H5288>lad<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> them, and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%>: but they <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them away <S%H4120>quickly<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H980>Bahurim<s%>, which had a <S%H875>well<s%> in his <S%H2691>court<s%>; <S%H8033>whither<s%> they went <S%H3381>down<s%>.

And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> a <S%H4539>covering<s%> over the <S%H875>well's<s%> <S%H6440>mouth<s%>, and <S%H7849>spread<s%> ground <S%H7383>corn<s%> thereon; and the <S%H1697>thing<s%> was not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

And when <S%H53>Absalom's<s%> <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%>, they <S%H559>said<s%>, Where is <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>? And the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, They be gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4323>brook<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>. And when they had <S%H1245>sought<s%> and could not <S%H4672>find<s%> them, they <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And it came to pass, <S%H310>after<s%> they were <S%H3212>departed<s%>, that they came <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H875>well<s%>, and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, and pass <S%H4120>quickly<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4325>water<s%>: for thus hath <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H3289>counselled<s%> against you.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that were with him, and they passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: by the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> there <S%H5737>lacked<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> of them that was not gone <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>.

And when <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H6098>counsel<s%> was not <S%H6213>followed<s%>, he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>ass<s%>, and <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and gat him <S%H3212>home<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%>, to his <S%H5892>city<s%>, and put his <S%H1004>household<s%> in <S%H6680>order<s%>, and <S%H2614>hanged<s%> himself, and <S%H4191>died<s%>, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>sepulchre<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%>. followed: Heb. done put his: Heb. gave charge concerning his house
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim<s%>. And <S%H53>Absalom<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, he and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with him.
